Reynolds Program in Social Entrepreneurship Twitter
Reynolds Program in Social Entrepreneurship Twitter

Twitter feed for the Reynolds Program in Social Entrepreneurship. Tweet topics include fellowship and job opportunities, social enterprise, fundraising for alumni causes, call for papers for conferences, corporate activism, REAL workshop series, changemaker challenge, live tweets from their speaker series, nonprofits, awards, The Battle for the Soul of the Social Sector event, the Leslie eLab, Tandon Bridge Program, and other events.
